mapper.select: select a.RID as "ID" ,-- 唯一主键 b.inhosno as "ZYID" ,-- 住院号 b.INTIMES as "VisitId" ,-- 住院次数 b.PATIENTID as "PatientId" ,-- 病例号 a.MAIN_FLAG as "DiagnosisTypeMain" ,-- 主要诊断标识 a.DISE_TYPE as "DiagnosisType" ,-- 诊断类型编号 d.dictname as "iagnosisTypeName" ,-- 诊断类型名称 a.DISE_CODE as "DiagnosisNo" ,-- 诊断编号 a.DISE_NAME as "DiagnosisName" ,-- 诊断名称 a.crte_time as "DiagnosisDate" ,-- 诊断日期 c.usercode as "DocId" ,-- 诊断医生工号 a.CRTER_NAME as "DocName" --诊断医生姓名 from IPR_INPATIENTINFO b,com_userinfo c, IPR_DIAGNOSE a left join com_dictcodeinfo d on d.typecode='DIAG_TYPE' and a.dise_type=d.dictcode left join (select orgcode,inid,listagg(text,',') within GROUP (order by text) as text from ( select orgcode ,inid,DISE_CODE||' '||DISE_NAME as text from IPR_DIAGNOSE where orgcode =#{map.OrgCode}) group by orgcode,inid ) e on e.orgcode=a.orgcode and a.inid=e.inid where a.orgcode =b.orgcode and a.inid=b.inid and a.orgcode =c.orgcode and a.crter=c.userid and a.isvalid='1' and a.orgcode=#{map.OrgCode} and b.inhosno=to_char(#{map.ID}) and a.crte_time >=to_date(#{map.StartDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.crte_time <=to_date(#{map.EndDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
